creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Densely brocaded designs, primarily in purple with pink, blue, green, orange and yellow accents. Imagery includes rows of  highly stylized birds, animals, zoomorphic figures. Simple randa joins panels, round-cut neckline is turned in and overcast.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
